com.datamelt.util

Class HeaderRow

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.datamelt.util.HeaderRow
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class HeaderRow
extends Object
implements Serializable
    the HeaderRow class represents a header row of field/column names in an ASCII file. the row is split into its individual fields using the default or a provided separator. it then contains an array of fields according to the fields of the header row.
    Author:
    uwe geercken
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
